name: The Spiral (George Games Studio)
description:
The Spiral is a minimal extreme precision arcade game, where your goal is to get to the center of the spiral. Sounds easy, right? (it isn't).

Twitter: https://twitter.com/GGS_official_1

some boring backstage info - The idea of this game was to create commercial arcade game in just one day. The limitation i gave to myself was to create game with one button control.  Pretty soon I realised the game was relatively easy, so I started to make it harder. Judge for yourself if it is hard enough, but I promise you will have a few rage moments :D

I hope you will like it! ;)

CONTROLS:

SPACE - Everything (almost)

M - Mute music

ESC - Exit game
